content:
On the night of March 13, Russia struck Shahamed with a high -rise building in Sumy. The attack is dead.

About thisinformsSumy Ova.

Thus, as a result of a hostile UAV type "Shahaned" on a residential five -storey building, 30 apartments were previously damaged, 15 of them were destroyed.

“According to preliminary information, 10 people were rescued from the rubble, 8 of whom were injured in varying severity. Unfortunately, there are dead (information is specified), ”the message reads.

Emergency work continues. All the necessary services work on the spot, the point of indomitability is deployed.

The consequences of the aviation strike are specified.

As reportedArmyinform, the number of victims of the rocket attack of the Russian Federation on Kryvyi Rih increased.
title: In Sumy after the Shahheda attack, 10 people were taken from the rubble, there are dead
description: About it reports Sumy Ova. Yes, as a result of the enclosure of hostile UAV type "Shahaned" by ...
author: Army Inform
